comments:
Environment is Eclipse 3.0 (Build id: 200309250800), latest equinox code from 
CVS retrieved on 10/10/03.

Code matching for Bundle-Classpath works fine if there are no spaces in the 
filter to be matched.  

For example:
Bundle-ClassPath: ., lib/calc-2000.jar;(os.arch=x86) 
Works fine.

But:
Bundle-ClassPath: ., lib/calc-2000.jar;(os.name=Windows 2000)
Does not work, and generates an exception:
